Question: This person was dubbed the "Queen of the Bs" (referring to her many roles in B-films).
Hints: This person's film career spanned the 1930s and 1940s, and she became a television star during the 1950s.
The Little Theatre was renamed the ____ Little Theatre in her honor.
When the young this person was caught admiring herself in it she was severely chastised for being vain.
